definition: (mountaineering) a descent of a vertical cliff or wall made by using a doubled rope that is fixed to a higher point and wrapped around the body, to lower oneself with a rope coiled around the body from a mountainside
details:
noun
- (mountaineering) a descent of a vertical cliff or wall made by using a doubled rope that is fixed to a higher point and wrapped around the body
= synonyms: rappel
verb
- to lower oneself with a rope coiled around the body from a mountainside
= example: to lower oneself with a rope coiled around the body from a mountainside
= synonyms: rappel
